content:
We are freezing the list of issues/pull requests that will make it into the stable release of the FHIR IG. If you have a change you would like before the stable release and it's not in this list, please add it with the before-1.0 label before Saturday, May 8.

Anything that's not on that list before then won't make the stable release. Thanks!!
(And if you aren't allowed to add the label, just put a link here and one of the committers will add it.)
